ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 452
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have offered advice and walkthrus ... totally ... citizen ... Well, when they stick the people you have to hunt down in unmarked buildings and don t tell
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Jenn" <juniper.jot@v...> wrote:
I have offered advice and walkthrus
> on quests tho, especially in Shar Vahl, those poor noob cats are
totally
> lost trying to figure out the town and where the NPCs are for
citizen
> quests.
>

Well, when they stick the people you have to hunt down in unmarked
buildings and don't tell you where they are, it gets a little hard to
locate them. Believe it or not, but so far, everyone I've given
stuff to has said thanks. Guess its just in some areas the ungratful
ones work in.
